E-Mail Messages
Date: Friday, 5/30/1992
Subject: Extension?
Dear Sir,
I am really enjoying playing for your team.
I would be interested in a contract extension!
How about you?

Regards,
Frank DiPino



Date: Sunday, 6/1/1992
Subject: Contract extension
Hello,
I just wanted to let you know that I'm
in my last year of the contract.
Are you interested in giving me an extension?
I'd be happy to play for you again next year!

Regards,
Ed Jurak



Date: Thursday, 6/5/1992
Subject: Progress of Armando Benitez
Dear Sir,
Armando Benitez has an ERA of 1.66 at A Kinston Indians!
I believe he is ready for the next level!

Regards,
Scouting Director

Team Doctor

Jose Moreno

a promotion wouldn't hurt him at all.

Regards,
Scouting Director

learning his new position, Centerfield.
I would rate his skills as "E" right now.

Regards,
Your scouting director

Date: Monday, 7/28/1992
Subject: My role in this team
Sir,
I believe that I am deserving more than being a reliver.
I want a spot in the rotation, I think
I would do an adequate job. Otherwise, I'd like to play
elsewhere!

Regards,
Keith MacWhorter
